Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: teachers are sometimes too brief and give feedback with no weight. It becomes set and forget when submitting assessments. AI sometimes gives pretty insightful feedback

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAi felt more critical at times. Some teachers do a very good job but not all

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI takes emotional side of feedback away
